data.description:
Specializations: Particular submersible type or class — Bongo, electric submarine.

This repair skill represents a character’s ability to fix and modify submersible vehicles. Each roll may repair one damaged system aboard a particular submersible. The cost and difficulty to repair depends on how badly it is damaged, and what systems have been hit. See “Using Repair Skills” above for difficulties  and costs associated with various systems which may be damaged.
data.time_taken: In general, 15 minutes, then one hour, then one day, then two days. May be customized by circumstances.
data.label: OD6S.CHAR_SKILLS
